title: The Work of ice
creator_credit: Boulton-Hawker Films and E F V A
brief_description: Some of the landforms associated with glacial erosion and deposition are shown in this film designed for school pupils aged 9-13. The French Alps, North Wales and East Yorkshire are depicted and the various landforms such as glaciers, moraines and aretes are explained.
